name: Light in the Dark (itch) (DXgames)
description:
During the Diwali vacation (Festival Holidays) I started a test project in Unity to get 2D lights working. I saw some interesting implementations in other games and wanted to try it out. 

I wanted to have a  project that I could complete in 2 months( but as game dev goes, it took a couple more weeks than that) . It was also supposed to be a game with an ending. 

My intention was to have the player feel comfortable getting lost while still having  the power of direction in a maze, void of danger. 

> I hope the game feels relaxing and you enjoy playing it. 

THE GAME IS FREE. You don't have to pay for it. 

I kept donations open out of curiosity.  If you do decide to donate, it is not a price for the game but to encourage the developer so Thank you.
